arStrings.szText: Unlock {c_highlight}Legendary Aspects{/c} by {c_highlight}salvaging Legendary items{/c} or {c_highlight}clearing dungeons{/c}. The {c_highlight}Codex of Power{/c} will always contain the most powerful version of each salvaged Legendary item.
Press {hotkey:Collections} to view your current {c_highlight}Legendary Aspects{/c} in the {c_highlight}Codex of Power{/c} in the Collections menu.
Press {hotkey:Map} and navigate to Collections menu to view your current {c_highlight}Legendary Aspects{/c} in the {c_highlight}Codex of Power{/c}.
Visit the {icon:Marker_Essence,2.5}{c_highlight}Occultist{/c} to Imprint {c_highlight}Legendary Aspects{/c} onto your equipment.
The potential power of most {c_highlight}Legendary Aspects{/c} increases with World Tier, reaching its highest value in World Tier 4.
